org.tinfour.demo.viewer.backplane

Class CompositeImageScale

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tinfour.demo.viewer.backplane.CompositeImageScale

  • public class CompositeImageScale
extends Object
    Provides the scale and dimension specifications for mapping model coordinates onto an image plane.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CompositeImageScale(int width, int height, AffineTransform m2c, AffineTransform c2m)
      Construct a specification for producing an image of the indicated dimensions.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CompositeImageScale

        public CompositeImageScale(int width,
                           int height,
                           AffineTransform m2c,
                           AffineTransform c2m)
        Construct a specification for producing an image of the indicated dimensions.
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the image bounds
        height - the height of the image bounds
        m2c - the model to composite image transform
        c2m - the composite image to model transform
